author: gartung
body:
#### PR description:
Update postprocess-scan-build.py to work with BeautifulSoup 4.x and python3.

#### PR validation:
Ran on index.html generated by scram b checker and verified that looks correct.

closes https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/154
title: Utilities/StaticAnalyzers: Update postprocess-scan-build.py for BeautifulSoup 4.x
